icp.application.classification

Class WaveletTransformFeatureExtraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • icp.application.classification.WaveletTransformFeatureExtraction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFeatureExtraction

    public class WaveletTransformFeatureExtraction
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFeatureExtraction
    Features extraction based on discrete wavelet transformation using eegdsp library
    Author:
    Jaroslav Klaus
